thread.title: BRIEF-Fir Tree Reports 8.97 Pct Stake In Resolute Energy Corp

title: BRIEF-Fir Tree Reports 8.97 Pct Stake In Resolute Energy Corp
text:
17 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Fir Tree Reports 8.97 Pct Stake In Resolute Energy Corp Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Resolute Energy Corp: 
* FIR TREE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT LP REPORTS 8.97 PERCENT STAKE IN RESOLUTE ENERGY CORP AS OF FEBRUARY 2, 2018 - SEC FILING‍​ 
* FIR TREE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT LP ACQUIRED RESOLUTE ENERGY‘S COMMON STOCK BECAUSE IT BELIEVED WHEN PURCHASED, REPRESENTED “ATTRACTIVE INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY” 
* FIR TREE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT LP - FILING SCHEDULE 13D IN SUPPORT OF MONARCH ALTERNATIVE CAPITAL'S PROPOSALS TO RESOLUTE ENERGY IN THEIR JAN 26 13D FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2BVQXau ) Further company coverage:
